title: New: Twin Sister – Gene Campi
body:
**Twin Sister** have dropped a new track from their new LP, _**In Heaven**_, out **September 27** on **[Domino](http://www.dominorecordco.com/artists/twin-sister).** The new release really Is a beauty; twanged out guitars, parping organs and some quirky vocals smoothly fit together to form an oddball pop gem.

Stream the track below.

[Twin Sister – Gene Ciampi](http://soundcloud.com/dominorecordco/twin-sister-gene-ciampi) by [DominoRecordCo](http://soundcloud.com/dominorecordco)

Twin Sister – Gene Ciampi by DominoRecordCo
